title: Part (a)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value 1) to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2) to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not describe one way that invasive species can decrease the carrying capacity for native species in an ecosystem, such as:

title: Part (b)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value 1) to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2) to score the response.

If the response contains more than one characteristic, only the first characteristic is scored.
descriptions: The response does not identify one of the characteristics of an r-selected species that could increase the likelihood of being invasive, such as:
The response identifies one of the characteristics of an r-selected species that could increase the likelihood of being invasive, such as:

title: Part (c)(i)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value 1) to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2) to score the response.

The students must show their work for full credit. Students do not need to include units in the setup.
descriptions: The response does not show the correct setup and does not have the correct final calculation.
The response does not show the correct setup or does not have the correct final calculation.

title: Part (c)(ii)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value 1) to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2) to score the response.

The students must show their work for full credit. Students do not need to include units in the setup.
descriptions: The response does not show the correct setup and does not have the correct final calculation.
The response does not show the correct setup or does not have the correct final calculation.
The response shows the correct setup and has the correct final calculation.

title: Part (d)(i)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value 1) to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2) to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not propose a realistic solution for reducing the zebra mussel population in the Hudson River, such as:
The response proposes a realistic solution for reducing the zebra mussel population in the Hudson River, such as:

title: Part (d)(ii)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value 1) to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and 2) to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not describe one potential negative consequence to a realistic solution proposed in (d)(i) for reducing the zebra mussel population in the Hudson River.
The response describes one potential negative consequence to a realistic solution proposed in (d)(i) for reducing the zebra mussel population in the Hudson River.
